channel.title: Sprite Requests
channel.description:
I have been trying to add new and 'unique' features to my server.. And now I need some sprites. The first, is.. Well. This is hard to explain. It'd almost be an image of the Home Teleport button, but with a faded arrow in place of the H, and it'd overlap the blue circles really. I also need it in 2 different sizes. One is 18x18. and the other is 22x23. Here's a copy of the Home teleport button:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MBGTGju.png[/img]
[hr][hr]
Now, I need some for my UI I'm making in a tab. UI=User interface. First, I need another image that's 22x23. It needs to resemble a Control Panel of some sort. Something that'll tell the user "Hey, there's buttons in here you need to look at"
Next, I need 9 images for my Mod/Admin/Owner part of the tab. [Player/Donor part comes later] It needs to consist of the following buttons:
[ol][li]Give Rank (So, something that shows a person giving another person something?)[/li] [li]Give Item/Coin (This could be like a p hat, or a cash stack)[/li] [li]Ban/Ipban player (So like a player in jail or somethng?)[/li] [li]Mute/Ipmute player (A player with a covered mouth?)[/li] [li]Staffzone tele (this button just tele's staff to the staffzone)[/li] [li]Teleto button (Tele's player 1 to player 2)[/li] [li]Teletome (Tele player 2 to player 1)[/li] [li]Teleall (Obvious)[/li] [li]Send Alert Message(Sends an alert across the server[/li][/ol]
Note: None of the images need to have text, as I can put the text on over it.
Now for the player side:
[ol][li]PK Teleport (sends the pk teleport list)[/li] [li]Skill Teleport (Takes you to the Skill zone)[/li] [li]Open Bank (Only works for player if not in wildy etc etc.)[/li] [li]Buy Food (Work in progress.)[/li] [li]Teleport to Donor Zone (Obvious)[/li] [li]Change into Demon (Makes your character a random demon)[/li] [li]Unused - Suggest[/li] [li]Unused - Suggest[/li] [li]Unused - Suggest[/li][/ol]
Here is the button that you will be using for each image:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3fdlGJB.png[/img]
Thank you all for taking the time to read, and thank you whoever makes the images.
I'm also in need of a gfx artist for my server, so if you'd like to. Please PM me.

item.title: Sprite Requests
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:7, topic:488091”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=606325.msg4250048#msg4250048 date=1362280061]
Oh I didn’t want it to fade. I wanted it faded. So it was pure white.
And the tip would be at the top of the image, and the end being the middle of the image.
The total size of the image is supposed to be 22x23
[/quote]
So you just want the opacity of it lowered?[/quote]
That’d be the easiest way I assume.

Read full topic

The total size of the image is supposed to be 22x23[/quote]

item.title: Sprite Requests
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

Since you want it to fade, you won’t be seeing much of the arrow because it’s white and the size of the image.

Oh I didn’t want it to fade. I wanted it faded. So it was pure white.
And the tip would be at the top of the image, and the end being the middle of the image.
The total size of the image is supposed to be 22x23

Read full topic

item.title: Sprite Requests
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I have been trying to add new and ‘unique’ features to my server… And now I need some sprites.
The first, is… Well. This is hard to explain. It’d almost be an image of the Home Teleport button, but with a faded arrow in place of the H, and it’d overlap the blue circles really.
I also need it in 2 different sizes. One is 18x18. and the other is 22x23.
Here’s a copy of the Home teleport button:

[hr][hr]

Now, I need some for my UI I’m making in a tab.
UI=User interface.
First, I need another image that’s 22x23. It needs to resemble a Control Panel of some sort. Something that’ll tell the user “Hey, there’s buttons in here you need to look at”

Next, I need 9 images for my Mod/Admin/Owner part of the tab. [Player/Donor part comes later]
It needs to consist of the following buttons:

[ol][li]Give Rank (So, something that shows a person giving another person something?)[/li]
[li]Give Item/Coin (This could be like a p hat, or a cash stack)[/li]
[li]Ban/Ipban player (So like a player in jail or somethng?)[/li]
[li]Mute/Ipmute player (A player with a covered mouth?)[/li]
[li]Staffzone tele (this button just tele’s staff to the staffzone)[/li]
[li]Teleto button (Tele’s player 1 to player 2)[/li]
[li]Teletome (Tele player 2 to player 1)[/li]
[li]Teleall (Obvious)[/li]
[li]Send Alert Message(Sends an alert across the server[/li][/ol]

Note: None of the images need to have text, as I can put the text on over it.

Now for the player side:

[ol][li]PK Teleport (sends the pk teleport list)[/li]
[li]Skill Teleport (Takes you to the Skill zone)[/li]
[li]Open Bank (Only works for player if not in wildy etc etc.)[/li]
[li]Buy Food (Work in progress.)[/li]
[li]Teleport to Donor Zone (Obvious)[/li]
[li]Change into Demon (Makes your character a random demon)[/li]
[li]Unused - Suggest[/li]
[li]Unused - Suggest[/li]
[li]Unused - Suggest[/li][/ol]

Here is the button that you will be using for each image:

Thank you all for taking the time to read, and thank you whoever makes the images.

I’m also in need of a gfx artist for my server, so if you’d like to. Please PM me.
